tool_description: Provide you with information of current and history Malaysia's gold price. Data source from www.bnm.gov.my
name: Gold Malaysia
title: Gold Malaysia

api_list.name: Latest Gold Price
api_list.description:
Latest daily trading prices of Malaysia gold bullion coin. 
Use this endpoint to get below information.
1. 1 ounce buying & selling price
2. 1/2 ounce buying & selling price
3. 1/4 ounce buying & selling price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-malaysia.p.rapidapi.com/gold/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-malaysia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-malaysia.p.rapidapi.com/gold/latest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-malaysia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Gold Price By Date
api_list.description:
Get daily trading prices of Malaysia gold bullion coin by date. 
Use this endpoint to get below information.
1. 1 ounce buying & selling price
2. 1/2 ounce buying & selling price
3. 1/4 ounce buying & selling price
